title: Cardinal Malcolm joins anti-Govt. protests in Colombo
body_lines: Cardinal Malcolm Ranjith along with several priests, nuns, and Christian organisations joined the protests against the President and his Government in Colombo yesterday.
He was accompanied by several priests, nuns, and Christian organisations in their march against the President.
The protestors were holding placards and the Sri Lankan flag during the protests. (newscutter.lk/sri-lanka-news/latest-news/cardinal-malcolm-joins-protests-in-colombo-05042022-29988/)
